00035 class KVIRC_API KviBasicIrcServerInfo
00036 {
00037         //ircnet
00038 protected:
00039         QString m_szServerVersion;
00040         KviIrcConnectionServerInfo * m_pParent;
00041 public:
00042         KviBasicIrcServerInfo(KviIrcConnectionServerInfo * pParent = 0, const QString & version = KviQString::Empty);
00043         virtual ~KviBasicIrcServerInfo();
00044 public:
00045         virtual const QString & getChannelModeDescription(char mode);
00046         virtual const QString & getUserModeDescription(QChar mode);
00047         virtual char getRegisterModeChar() { return 0; };
00048         virtual const char * getSoftware() { return "Ircd"; };
00049         virtual bool getNeedsOpToListModeseI() { return false; };
00050 };
00051 
00052 class KVIRC_API KviUnrealIrcServerInfo : public KviBasicIrcServerInfo
00053 {
00054 public:
00055         KviUnrealIrcServerInfo(KviIrcConnectionServerInfo * pParent = 0, const QString & version = KviQString::Empty)
00056                 :KviBasicIrcServerInfo(pParent, version) {;};
00057         virtual char getRegisterModeChar() { return 'r'; };
00058         virtual const char * getSoftware() { return "Unreal"; };
00059         virtual bool getNeedsOpToListModeseI() { return false; };
00060         virtual const QString & getChannelModeDescription(char mode);
00061 };

00158 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionServerInfo
00159 {
00160         friend class KviConsole; // for now
00161         friend class KviServerParser;
00162         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00163 protected:
00164         KviIrcConnectionServerInfo();
00165         ~KviIrcConnectionServerInfo();
00166 private:
00167         KviBasicIrcServerInfo * m_pServInfo;
00168         QString m_szName;                      // the most actual server name (may be the one we specify or the one that the server wants to be known as)
00169         QString m_szSupportedUserModes;        // the supported user modes
00170         QString m_szSupportedChannelModes;     // the supported channel modes (all of them)
00171         QString m_szSupportedModePrefixes;     // the actually used mode prefixes  @+
00172         kvi_u32_t * m_pModePrefixTable;        // the mode prefixes above in a table
00173         unsigned int m_uPrefixes;
00174         QString m_szSupportedModeFlags;        // the actually used mode flags     ov
00175         QString m_szSupportedChannelTypes;     // the supported channel types
00176         bool m_bSupportsWatchList;             // supports the watch list ?
00177         bool m_bSupportsCodePages;             // supports the /CODEPAGE command ?
00178         int m_iMaxTopicLen;
00179         int m_iMaxModeChanges;
00180         // Mode that adds or removes a nick or address to a list. Always has a parameter (eg: "b" as ban)
00181         QString m_szListModes;
00182         // Mode that changes a setting and always has a parameter (eg: "k" as channel key)
00183         QString m_szParameterModes;
00184         // Mode that changes a setting and only has a parameter when set (eg: "l" as channel limit)
00185         QString m_szParameterWhenSetModes;
00186         // Mode that changes a setting and never has a parameter (eg: "m" as channel moderated)
00187         QString m_szPlainModes;
00188         bool m_bSupportsCap;
00189         QStringList m_lSupportedCaps;
00190 public:
00191         char  registerModeChar() { return m_pServInfo ?  m_pServInfo->getRegisterModeChar() : 0; };
00192         const char * software() { return m_pServInfo ? m_pServInfo->getSoftware() : 0; };
00193         bool getNeedsOpToListModeseI() { return m_pServInfo ? m_pServInfo->getNeedsOpToListModeseI() : false; };
00194         const QString & name() { return m_szName; };
00195         const QString & supportedUserModes() { return m_szSupportedUserModes; };
00196         const QString & supportedChannelModes() { return m_szSupportedChannelModes; };
00197         const QString & supportedChannelTypes() { return m_szSupportedChannelTypes; };
00198         const QString & supportedModePrefixes() { return m_szSupportedModePrefixes; };
00199         const QString & supportedModeFlags() { return m_szSupportedModeFlags; };
00200         const QString & supportedListModes() { return m_szListModes; };
00201         const QString & supportedParameterModes() { return m_szParameterModes; };
00202         const QString & supportedParameterWhenSetModes() { return m_szParameterWhenSetModes; };
00203         const QString & supportedPlainModes() { return m_szPlainModes; };
00204         bool supportsCap() { return m_bSupportsCap; };
00205         const QStringList & supportedCaps() { return m_lSupportedCaps; };
00206         bool supportsWatchList() { return m_bSupportsWatchList; };
00207         bool supportsCodePages() { return m_bSupportsCodePages; };
00208 
00209         int maxTopicLen() { return m_iMaxTopicLen; };
00210         int maxModeChanges() { return m_iMaxModeChanges; };
00211 
00212         void setServerVersion(const QString & version);
00213 
00214         const QString & getChannelModeDescription(char mode) { return m_pServInfo->getChannelModeDescription(mode); };
00215         const QString & getUserModeDescription(QChar mode) { return m_pServInfo->getUserModeDescription(mode); };
00216 
00217         bool isSupportedModePrefix(QChar c);
00218         bool isSupportedModeFlag(QChar c);
00219         QChar modePrefixChar(kvi_u32_t flag);
00220         QChar modeFlagChar(kvi_u32_t flag);
00221         kvi_u32_t modeFlagFromPrefixChar(QChar c);
00222         kvi_u32_t modeFlagFromModeChar(QChar c);
00223 protected:
00224         void setName(const QString &szName) { m_szName = szName; };
00225         void setSupportedUserModes(const QString &szSupportedUserModes) { m_szSupportedUserModes = szSupportedUserModes; };
00226         void setSupportedChannelModes(const QString &szSupportedChannelModes);
00227         void setSupportedModePrefixes(const QString &szSupportedModePrefixes,const QString &szSupportedModeFlags);
00228         void setSupportedChannelTypes(const QString &szSupportedChannelTypes) { m_szSupportedChannelTypes = szSupportedChannelTypes; };
00229         void setSupportsWatchList(bool bSupportsWatchList) { m_bSupportsWatchList = bSupportsWatchList; };
00230         void setSupportsCodePages(bool bSupportsCodePages) { m_bSupportsCodePages = bSupportsCodePages; };
00231         void addSupportedCaps(const QString &szCapList);
00232         void setMaxTopicLen(int iTopLen) { m_iMaxTopicLen=iTopLen; };
00233         void setMaxModeChanges(int iModes) { m_iMaxModeChanges=iModes; };
00234 private:
00235         void buildModePrefixTable();
00236 };
